details: The script utilizes OAR (Open Application Resource) for resource allocation. It requests 1 node with 8 cores and a walltime of 30 hours. The script then loads the conda environment version 2020.11-python3.8 and activates the environment named 'myenv'. Finally, it executes the Python script 'optim_filters.py' with ten arguments provided as command-line parameters.  The script also relies on the conda package manager and the Python programming language.
